item.title: Android Booting Process
item.description: This article describes Android booting process. Booting Process Step 1: Power On and System Startup. When we press the power button, the Boot ROM code starts executing from a pre-defined location which is hardwired in ROM.

item.title: Android Logs
item.description: Logcat This command of adb is used to get system log. It’s an equivalent to Ubuntu syslog, as far as I understand.

item.title: IPC Attacks
item.description: Fragment Injection To read: https://securityintelligence.com/new-vulnerability-android-framework-fragment-injection/ Preamble: Reflection Fragments require Reflection API. What’s that? Compare two ways of instanciating a class:
